name: Wuul Wool
description:
Game Jam's game made in 72h with as theme "Sheep"

Rooted the wolf with your wool and touch them for kill him !

Finished the 10 levels in "With End" mode or play in "Endless" mode for a unlimited fun ^^

Credits :

Théo Verwaerde : Programming / Animation

Bryan Wallet : Game Design / Level Design

Aurélien Van-Oppen : 3D Model of Sheep and Wolf
